hotels.title: Elegant Five-Star Kyiv Escape near St. Michael's Golden-Domed Monastery
hotels.description: Discover the many wonders of the Ukrainian capital with a five-star stay at Intercontinental Kyiv, an IHG Hotel. Located just steps from the city's iconic St. Michael's Golden-Domed Monastery and moments from the upscale stores of Khreschatyk Street, the elegant and modern hotel is the perfect base to discover Kyiv's charm. When you're not exploring the local sights, stay in and be spoilt for choice with an onsite spa, four restaurants, a shimmering pool and an upscale fitness centre.
